_comment: Configuration file for Word to PDF Converter
_instructions: Fill in the paths below and run: python word_to_pdf.py --config
_batch_mode_comment: Set batch_mode to true to convert all Word files in a folder
_notes: For single file conversion: Set batch_mode=false and specify input_file and output_file
For batch conversion: Set batch_mode=true and specify input_folder and output_folder
If output_file or output_folder is empty, PDFs will be saved in the same location as source files
Set recursive=true to process subfolders in batch mode
Use double backslashes (\\) in Windows paths or forward slashes (/) work too
